summary: Diff adds a Motoko backend content model + admin-guarded CRUD endpoints (partially visible due to truncation) and a new React/TanStack Router frontend with public pages (Home/Category/Detail/Search), admin pages, query-param-based filtering/sorting, and basic SEO title/description handling. Some requested items are not evidenced (pagination/infinite load, created timestamp display, favicon configuration). Also introduces unrequested user-profile onboarding modal and related backend profile APIs.

missing_requirements.requirement: Each category landing page lists only its corresponding post type with pagination or infinite load.
missing_requirements.reason: CategoryPage filters by postType, but there is no evidence of pagination/infinite loading (no page size, cursor, load-more, or pagination controls shown).

missing_requirements.requirement: Posts display created/updated timestamps in the UI.
missing_requirements.reason: UI evidence shows updated timestamps (e.g., PostCard and PostDetailPage), but created timestamp display is not evidenced in the provided diffs (and PostDetailPage snippet only shows Updated).

missing_requirements.requirement: Favicon is stored under frontend/public/assets/generated and configured for the app (browser tab).
missing_requirements.reason: Logo usage in the header is shown, but there is no evidence of favicon asset addition/configuration (e.g., in HTML head, manifest, or router/meta). Added public asset files are not shown, and no frontend head/HTML file changes are evidenced.

hallucinated_features.description: User profile system (backend UserProfile storage + frontend ProfileSetupModal prompting for user name).
hallucinated_features.reason: BuildRequest does not ask for user profiles or onboarding; it only requires admin publishing workflow secured by Internet Identity and public browsing/search.

hallucinated_features.description: Non-admin access control UX and routes beyond required publishing workflow (e.g., dedicated AccessDeniedScreen and AdminRoute wrapper components).
hallucinated_features.reason: While admin-only mutations are required, these specific UI components/pages are not explicitly requested; they add extra UX behavior not specified in requirements.
